titles.title: Urging the Government of Sri Lanka and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam to engage positively in the forthcoming peace talks and prevent a return to armed conflict in Sri Lanka.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 2/8/2006--Introduced. Urges the government of Sri Lanka and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam to: (1) engage positively in the forthcoming peace talks and to prevent a return to armed conflict in Sri Lanka; (2) renegotiate and implement a cease-fire agreement; and (3) focus on rebuilding a peaceful and prosperous future for Sri Lanka.
